item.title: 中国可能在 2026 年追求 5%的 GDP 增长，以结束通货紧缩
item.description: 中国政府顾问和分析师表示，中国明年很可能会坚持目前5%左右的年度经济增长目标，这一目标要求政府在寻求摆脱通货紧缩困境的同时，保持财政和货币政策的开放。【原文：China is likely to stick to its current annual economic growth target of around 5% next year, government advisers and analysts said, a goal that would require authorities to keep fiscal and monetary spigots open as they seek to snap a deflationary spell.】

item.title: NHTSA表示，Rivian将因安全带问题召回近3.5万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周三表示，Rivian汽车公司计划召回34824辆美国汽车，原因是安全带预紧线受损，可能无法正确束缚驾驶员的安全带，增加碰撞受伤风险。【原文：Rivian Automotive plans to recall 34,824 U.S. vehicles due to a damaged seat belt pretension cable that may fail to properly restrain the driver's seat belt, increasing crash injury risk, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 文件显示，中国力士乐计划在越南生产游戏机
item.description: 中国的苹果耳机制造商Luxshare-ICT公司在给当地政府的一份建议书中说，该公司计划从明年起在越南生产游戏机，年产能可达450万台。【原文：Chinese Luxshare-ICT, Apple's airpods maker, is planning to produce game consoles in Vietnam with annual capacity of up to 4.5 million units starting from next year, the company said in a proposal to local authorities.】

item.title: 雨果-博斯（Hugo Boss）在战略调整中将目标定为长期 12% 的营业利润率
item.description: 德国时尚集团雨果博斯（Hugo Boss）周三表示，作为战略调整的一部分，该公司的目标是在中长期内实现约 12% 的营业利润率。【原文：German fashion group Hugo Boss on Wednesday said that it aims to achieve an operating profit margin of around 12% over the medium-to-long term as part of a strategic overhaul.】

item.title: 解说：陆地空间如何成为 SpaceX 最大的中国挑战者
item.description: 陆地空间公司已成为中国最先进的私营火箭公司，也是中国最接近埃隆-马斯克的 SpaceX 公司的公司，它追随美国竞争对手，将未来押注在可飞行多次的火箭上。【原文：LandSpace has become China's most advanced private rocket company and the country's closest equivalent to Elon Musk's SpaceX, following U.S. rivals in betting its future on rockets that can fly more than once.】

item.title: 可重复使用火箭：迄今为止谁取得了哪些成就？
item.description: 中国的朱雀三号可重复使用火箭由私营公司陆地空间开发，虽然周三未能成功着陆，但它的首次发射将全球可重复使用火箭的竞争推到了聚光灯下。【原文：China's Zhuque-3 reusable rocket, developed by private firm LandSpace, failed to make a successful landing on Wednesday, but its debut launch has thrust the global race for reusable rockets into the spotlight.】

item.title: 空中客车公司因机身缺陷下调 2025 年商用飞机交付目标
item.description: 空中客车公司周三将其2025年的商用飞机交付目标下调至约790架，原因是供应商的机身面板质量问题影响了其A320生产线。【原文：Airbus on Wednesday lowered its commercial aircraft delivery target to around 790 aircraft for 2025 due to a supplier quality issue on fuselage panels impacting its A320 line.】

item.title: Binance 任命 Yi He 为联席首席执行官
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Binance 周三表示，已任命联合创始人 Yi He 担任公司联席首席执行官。【原文：Cryptocurrency exchange Binance has appointed co-founder Yi He as its co-chief executive, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 文件显示，富士康子公司计划扩大在越南的生产
item.description: 根据一份发给北宁省环保部门的公司文件，台湾电子制造商富士康的子公司富山科技正在申请在越南扩大生产的许可，以生产 Xbox 游戏机和其他电子零件。【原文：Fushan Technology, a subsidiary of Taiwanese electronics manufacturer Foxconn, is seeking a permit to expand production in Vietnam to make Xbox game consoles and other electronic parts, according to a company document sent to Bac Ninh province's environmental department.】

item.title: 早间竞价：风险上、风险下、风险上
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 印度数据中心运营商 Sify Infinit Spaces 押注人工智能热潮，但对泡沫保持警惕
item.description: 即将成为印度首家上市数据中心运营商的 Sify Infinit Spaces 公司首席执行官表示，该公司认为人工智能推动了对计算能力的需求，但正在控制未来的投资，以避免过度暴露于潜在的泡沫。【原文：Sify Infinit Spaces , set to become India's first listed data center operator, sees AI driving demand for computing power but is tempering future investments to avoid over-exposure to a potential bubble, its chief executive said.】

item.title: 印度国会要求议会就国营智能手机应用程序展开辩论
item.description: 印度主要反对党周三表示，政府计划在智能手机上预装一款国营应用程序，这侵犯了用户隐私，政府需要做出解释。【原文：India's main opposition party said on Wednesday that a government plan to preload a state-run app on smartphones violates the privacy of users and the government needed to explain itself, escalating tensions on a matter that has sparked surveillance fears.】

item.title: 受关税和资本外流影响，卢比兑美元跌破 90
item.description: 印度卢比周三跌穿了 1 美元兑 90 卢比的关键心理价位，延续了八个月来的跌势，原因是贸易和投资领域的美元外流，以及公司急于避险以防止货币进一步走软。【原文：The Indian rupee fell past the key psychological level of 90 to the dollar on Wednesday, extending an eight-month decline as dollar outflows for trade and investment and a rush by companies to hedge against further weakness pummelled the currency.】

item.title: 中国主要银行下调高收益存款产品以缓解利润压力
item.description: 中国的一些大型商业银行已经取消了收益率较高的五年期大额存单，以努力降低成本，抵消利润压力。【原文：Some major Chinese commercial banks have removed five-year, large-scale certificates of deposit that carry a high yield from their offerings, in an effort to cut costs and offset margin pressure.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券交易所故障加深了投资者对技术改革的疑虑
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所（Australian Securities Exchange）的技术转型计划被该公司主席吹捧为 "太重要了，不能失败"，但在本周遭遇新的故障后，该计划正面临着投资者和市场参与者的质疑。【原文：The Australian Securities Exchange's technology turnaround plan, touted by the firm's chair as being too important to fail, is facing questions from investors and market participants after it was hit by a fresh outage this week, the latest in a string of failures.】

item.title: 汇丰出人意料地任命临时主席纳尔逊为永久主席
item.description: 汇丰控股的临时主席布兰登-尼尔森（Brendan Nelson）将正式接任这一职务，在这家专注于亚洲市场的银行开始寻找前任主席马克-塔克（Mark Tucker）的继任者七个月后，这一举动令人吃惊。【原文：HSBC Holdings' interim chairman Brendan Nelson will move into that role on a permanent basis, in a surprise move that came seven months after the Asia-focused lender started a search to replace its former chair Mark Tucker.】

item.title: 需求疲软导致油价下跌，市场等待乌克兰和平努力带来供应迹象
item.description: 周三，油价连续第二天下跌，因为投资者在等待俄乌战争的和平谈判是否会开放更多的供应，而库存增加则凸显了市场对石油过剩的广泛担忧。【原文：Oil prices fell for a second day on Wednesday as investors waited to see if peace talks in the Russia-Ukraine war could open up more supply amid wider concerns about a surplus, highlighted by rising inventories.】

item.title: 机身缺陷影响交付，空客准备对 A320 进行检查
item.description: 空中客车公司的工程师在更大范围的A320机身面板上发现了缺陷，他们正准备对数百架喷气式飞机进行缺陷检查，该公司首席执行官称这一缺陷正在影响飞机的交付。【原文：Airbus engineers have found defects on a wider set of A320 fuselage panels as they prepare to inspect hundreds of jets for a flaw that the company's chief executive says is hurting deliveries.】

item.title: 洞察力：人工智能狂潮正在引发一场新的全球供应链危机
item.description: 全球内存芯片的严重短缺正迫使人工智能和消费电子公司争夺日益减少的供应，因为这些并不华丽但对设备存储数据至关重要的元件价格飞涨。【原文：An acute global shortage of memory chips is forcing artificial intelligence and consumer-electronics companies to fight for dwindling supplies, as prices soar for the unglamorous but essential components that allow devices to store data.】

item.title: 私营企业采购经理人指数显示，11月中国服务业增速降至5个月低点
item.description: 周三公布的一项民间调查显示，尽管外需有所提振，但由于新订单增长放缓，11 月份中国服务业活动的扩张速度为五个月来最慢。【原文：China's services activity expanded at its slowest pace in five months in November, as growth in new orders softened despite a boost from foreign demand, according to a private survey released on Wednesday.】

item.title: 比特币下滑，全球债券暂停，股市上涨
item.description: 由于全球债券市场和加密货币的短暂抛售减弱，隔夜华尔街股市反弹，亚洲股市周三走稳。【原文：Asia shares were on steadier footing on Wednesday, helped by an overnight rebound on Wall Street as a brief selloff in global bond markets and cryptocurrencies abated.】

item.title: 美元在美联储会议前稍事喘息
item.description: 由于其他资产抢占了美元的风头，美元在周三陷入困境，尽管投资者开始将目光投向2026年，认为美国降息将对美元造成压力。【原文：The dollar was becalmed on Wednesday, as other assets hogged the limelight, though investors looking ahead to 2026 were starting to position for U.S. rate cuts to weigh on the greenback.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Netflix、华纳兄弟的发现组合有望降低消费者成本
item.description: 据两位熟悉该提案的人士透露，Netflix 拟收购华纳兄弟发现公司的电影公司和流媒体部门，通过捆绑 Netflix 和 HBO Max，有望降低消费者的流媒体成本。【原文：Netflix's proposed acquisition of Warner Bros Discovery's studios and streaming unit is expected to reduce streaming costs for consumers by bundling Netflix and HBO Max, according to two people familiar with the proposal.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：Anthropic 计划最早于 2026 年上市
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，由 Alphabet 旗下谷歌和亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）支持的人工智能初创公司 Anthropic 已聘请 Wilson Sonsini 律师事务所为最早可能于 2026 年进行的首次公开募股做准备。【原文：Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup backed by Alphabet's Google and Amazon.com , has hired the law firm Wilson Sonsini to prepare for an initial public offering that could take place as early as 2026, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: YouTube 表示将遵守澳大利亚青少年社交媒体禁令
item.description: 谷歌的 YouTube 表示，它将遵守澳大利亚对 16 岁以下儿童社交媒体账户的世界领先禁令，这一让步意味着所有拥有年轻用户的最受欢迎平台都同意遵守这一禁令。【原文：Google's YouTube said it will obey Australia's world-leading ban on social media accounts for children under 16, a capitulation which means all the most popular platforms with young users have agreed to comply after campaigning against the law.】

item.title: 独家报道：更多运往中国的美国大豆将于 12 月中旬装船
item.description: 路透社周二看到的一份船运时间表显示，在紧张的关税战导致贸易停滞数月之后，至少有六艘散装货船计划在海湾沿岸码头装运大豆，一直到12月中旬。【原文：Shipments of U.S. crops to China are accelerating after a tense tariff war had stalled trade for months, with at least six bulk cargo vessels scheduled to load with soybeans at Gulf Coast terminals through mid-December, according to a shipping schedule seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国邮政使用 2,600 辆电动汽车投递邮件
item.description: 路透社在周二看到的美国邮政局致国会的一封信中说，美国邮政局目前正在使用 2,600 多辆电动汽车投递邮件。【原文：The U.S. Postal Service is currently using more than 2,600 electric vehicles for mail deliveries, the agency said in a letter to Congress seen by Reuters Tuesday.】

item.title: Baldwin 出价 10 亿美元收购竞争对手 CAC 集团的保险经纪公司
item.description: 鲍德温集团周二表示，将以 10.3 亿美元的现金加股票交易收购竞争对手保险经纪公司 CAC 集团。【原文：The Baldwin Group said on Tuesday it will buy rival insurance broker CAC Group in a $1.03 billion cash-and-stock deal, adding to a string of mergers in recent years as industry consolidation accelerates.】

item.title: 微芯科技上调第三季度利润和收入预期
item.description: 芯片制造商微芯科技（Microchip Technology）周二上调了对第三季度净销售额和每股收益的预期，这主要得益于强劲的预订量，该公司股价在盘后交易中上涨了 2.3%。【原文：Chipmaker Microchip Technology on Tuesday raised its expectations for third-quarter net sales and earnings per share, driven by strong bookings, sending its shares up 2.3% in extended trading.】

item.title: 独家报道：联合利华支持的审计发现 Ben & Jerry's 基金会在财务控制和管理方面存在缺陷
item.description: 据联合利华旗下将于下周分拆上市的 Magnum 公司称，对 Ben & Jerry's 基金会进行的审计发现，该基金会在财务控制和管理方面存在缺陷。【原文：An audit of the Ben & Jerry's Foundation, a U.S.-based non-profit solely funded by the brand, found that it had deficiencies in financial controls and governance, according to Magnum, the Unilever unit set to be spun off next week that will own the ice-cream maker.】
